sentences.en: About once in ten years snow falls on Mexico City.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥城大约每隔十年降一次雪.

sentences.en: All but one of the deaths were in Mexico, the epicenter of the outbreak.
sentences.cn: 除一人外，其他死亡患者都在疾病爆发的中心地墨西哥。

sentences.en: He made his triumphal entry into Mexico City.
sentences.cn: 他以胜利者的姿态进入墨西哥城。

sentences.en: He wore out his shoes wandering around Mexico City.
sentences.cn: 他在墨西哥城到处游荡，磨坏了鞋子。

sentences.en: Hurricane Andrew was last night heading into the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.cn: 昨晚，飓风“安德鲁”进入了墨西哥湾。

sentences.en: I'll stay in Mexico as long as my money holds on.
sentences.cn: 只要我的钱还能维持一天,我就在墨西哥待一天.

sentences.en: I've just finished reading a book on the ancient kingdoms of Mexico.
sentences.cn: 我刚读完一本关于墨西哥古代诸王国的书.

sentences.en: In New Mexico all kinds of cuisines are represented.
sentences.cn: 在新墨西哥州，有各种各样的烹饪方法。

sentences.en: Mexico achieved independence from Spain in 1821.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥于1821年脱离西班牙获得独立.

sentences.en: Mexico called for an immediate cessation of hostilities.
sentences.cn: 墨西哥要求立即停止敌对行动。

sentences.en: Savour the culinary delights of Mexico.
Texas has a long history of trade with Mexico.
sentences.cn: 得克萨斯州与墨西哥的贸易往来历史悠久。

sentences.en: The Pontiff celebrated mass in Mexico City.
sentences.cn: 教皇在墨西哥城主持了弥撒。

sentences.en: The United States bounds on Mexico in the south.
sentences.cn: 美国的南面与墨西哥接壤。

sentences.en: These ceremonies were already part of pre-Christian ritual in Mexico.
sentences.cn: 这些仪式已经成为墨西哥基督教时期以前的宗教仪式的一部分。

sentences.en: We want to prove that in Mexico.
sentences.cn: 我们要在墨西哥证明这一点。

phrases.tran_cn: 墨西哥湾（位于北美东南部边缘）
